page.title: 13Adult life
page.content: With two very active community centres there is much on offer for recreation and interest.There are various clubs that members of the villages can attend ;these include,tabletennis,badminton,the W.I.,the Wednesday club, a library service run by the community with help from the county service,evening classes in such subjects as yoga and local history,and probably the most involved society the Croft Entertainments Committee.This committee was set up to provide money for the summer school to usefully occupy childrens' time in the long summer break. It has gone from strength to strength and involves all ages and all sections of the community.The shows that are produced are not only good but serve the community in the best possible sense.
